name: Alice
title: alice.tech
shortDescription: Alice is an AI-powered study tool designed to enhance the learning process for students. It transforms uploaded materials into tailored notes and exercises, helping users identify knowledge gaps and prepare effectively for exams. Ideal for students, Alice offers a practical way to convert overwhelming course material into manageable study sessions.
cons: Limited features in the free plan
Dependent on quality of uploaded content

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Quizlet
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers diverse study modes and flashcards.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Kahoot!
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Interactive quizzes for learning and assessment.
